tool_description: Improve SEO! Use summarized content themes in top ranked search engine results.
title: Common themese from top 10 SERP

api_list.name: Top 10 SERP Common Themes - Query
api_list.description: Submit a search query. Use provided token to get results with the other endpoint, or get results with callback URL.

api_list.name: Top 10 SERP Common Themes - Results
api_list.description: Retrieve results for previously submitted query (first wait 1 minute). Token is valid for about 15 minutes after query submission.

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: token was provided as a response to submission of this query
